MFI/Sacco Device Financing

Enabling Secured
SmartPhone Loans

A Solution for Banks & Microfinance Institutions, 2025 and Beyond. An initiative of Energy Bora.

Our Approach

  • Enable financial institutions to provide secured digital devices financing

  • Offer a locking mechanism to mitigate loan default risks

  • Enable last-mile delivery via bank branches, courier pick-ups, or home delivery

  • Provide device management, unlocking support & after-sales service

  • Empower under served communities with digital and financial tools

Finance Your Purchase Through Your Sacco

Partner with your Sacco to get the device you need with convenient monthly payment plans. Choose from 3 to 24 months financing options with competitive rates.

How It Works

1

Choose Your Device

Browse our selection of phones and electronics

2

Select Financing

Click "Select Financing" on any product

3

Fill the Form

Provide your details and select your Sacco

4

Get Approved

Your Sacco will contact you to complete the process
